unknown.title: Unexpected Error
unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact your administrator.

404.title: Oops! It looks like you took a wrong turn...
404.message: We're sorry. The page you are looking for is not available.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: There was a problem authorizing you.

serviceUnavailable.title: Service Unavailable
serviceUnavailable.message: There was an error connecting to the service. Please try again later.

dashboard.config.title: Dashboard Error
dashboard.config.message: The dashboard is improperly configured. Please contact your administrator.

validation.startDateInPast: Start date cannot be in the past
validation.startDateBeforeEnd: Start date should be before the end date
validation.endDateInPast: End date cannot be in the past
validation.endDateAfterStart: End date should be after the start date
validation.endDateInsideAllowablePeriod: End date should be within the allowable time period {{period}}
validation.minDate: Date should be on or after {{min}}.
validation.maxDate: Date should be on or before {{max}}.
validation.minTime: Time should be at or after {{min}}.
validation.maxTime: Time should be at or before {{max}}.
validation.integerField: This field must be an integer.
validation.minField: Must be greater than or equal to {{min}}.
validation.maxField: Must be less than or equal to {{max}}.
validation.minLengthField: Must be longer than or equal to {{min}} characters.
validation.maxLengthField: Must be shorter than or equal to {{max}} characters.
